(await ethers.provider.getAddress(accounts[0]))
(await ethers.provider.getAddress(accounts[0])).toString()
(await ethers.provider.getBalance(accounts[0])).toString()
accounts = await ethers.getSigners()
(await ethers.provider.getBalance(accounts[0])).toString()
accounts = await ethers.getSigners()
accounts = await ethers.provider.getSigners()
(await ethers.provider.getBalance(accounts[0])).toString()
accounts = await ethers.provider.listAccounts()
exit()
exit
cls
const accounts = await ethers.provider.getAccounts();
console.log(accounts);
const accounts = await ethers.provider.listAccounts();
(await box.retrieve()).toString()
await box.store(100)
(await box.retrieve()).toString()
await box.retrieve()
await box.store(42)
console.log(box)
const box = await Box.attach('0x9fE46736679d2D9a65F0992F2272dE9f3c7fa6e0');
const Box = await ethers.getContractFactory('Box');
